name: Your next event
description: Got something to celebrate? Then it is time you celebrated the benefits of our Banqueting Suites as the perfect venue for your next event.

name: Large capacity
description: Hold between 500-600 people and offer state-of-the-art technology to support a seamless event..

name: Experience the finest
description: Cutting edge AV equipment and RGB LED mood lighting can be adapted to suit your theme, along with large LED screens and a dedicated dancefloor..

name: Easily accessible
description: Located in North London, just 20 minutes away from Liverpool Street, with excellent transport links to Central London and 200 designated car parking spaces on site..
